picked_headlines.summary: Optimizing LLMs for edge devices through cognitive edge computing.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article provides a comprehensive overview of deploying large language models on edge devices, crucial for engineers and tech stakeholders aiming to enhance AI accessibility and efficiency.

picked_headlines.summary: Custom RISC-V GPU instructions boost HDC-CNN model performance by 56.2x.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This piece highlights significant advancements in energy-efficient computing, appealing to both product engineers and management interested in cutting-edge hardware solutions.

digest:
- *EncouRAGe* offers a modular framework for RAG systems, enhancing reproducibility and design flexibility. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.04696)
- *ProRefine* improves AI prompt design using feedback loops, boosting reasoning accuracy. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.05305)
- *DMA* integrates human feedback into RAG systems for real-time adaptation, enhancing QA task performance. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.04880)
- *OpsAgent* automates incident management in cloud systems, improving interpretability. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.24145)
- *PuzzleMoE* compresses MoE models efficiently, maintaining high accuracy. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.04805)
- *AgentExpt* automates AI experiment design, improving dataset retrieval and research reliability. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.04921)
- *G-TRACE* quantifies GenAI's carbon emissions, proposing a sustainable AI governance model. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.04776)
- *LiveStar* enhances real-time video understanding, outperforming existing models. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.05299)
- *RCCDA* optimizes ML model updates under concept drift, enhancing accuracy and efficiency. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2505.24149)
- *Orion-MSP* improves tabular in-context learning with multi-scale processing. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.02818)
